name: Bastiodon
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

poke_body.name: Protective Wall
poke_body.effect: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks.

attacks.name: Anger Revenge
attacks.effect: If Bastiodon was damaged by an attack during your opponent’s last turn, this attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
